data.eml:eml: Portaratrum, a new genus of deep­sea Tanaidacea (Crustacea) with description of two new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Guerrero-Kommritz, Jürgen (2003): Portaratrum, a new genus of deep­sea Tanaidacea (Crustacea) with description of two new species. Zootaxa 282: 1-14, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.156812
